title: Create New Bucket
subtitle: Configure all advanced options for your new S3 bucket
bucketNameHelp: Only lowercase letters, numbers, dots (.) and hyphens (-). Must be globally unique.
makePublicHelp: Public buckets allow anonymous access. Not recommended for sensitive data.
versioningHelp: Keeps multiple versions of each object. Required for Object Lock.
objectLockTitle: Object Lock & WORM (Write Once Read Many)
objectLockWarning1: Once enabled, it CANNOT BE DISABLED
objectLockWarning2: Objects cannot be deleted until their retention period expires
objectLockWarning3: COMPLIANCE mode: Not even the root user can delete objects
objectLockWarning4: GOVERNANCE mode: Only users with special permissions can bypass
complianceModeDesc: Maximum protection. No one can delete or modify objects, not even the root user. Ideal for legal and regulatory requirements (SEC, FINRA, HIPAA).
governanceModeDesc: Flexible protection. Users with special permissions can bypass retention. Useful for testing and scenarios where flexibility is needed.
retentionHelp: Specify at least one. Objects cannot be deleted during this period.
complianceWarning: ⚠️ COMPLIANCE mode selected: This bucket will be IMMUTABLE. Objects cannot be deleted under any circumstances until retention expires.
expirationHelp: Objects are permanently deleted after N days (0 = no expiration)
serverEncryptionHelp: Encryption is not enabled on the server. To enable encryption, configure encryption_key in config.yaml and restart the server.
encryptionInfo: AES-256-CTR Encryption - All objects in this bucket will be encrypted at rest using streaming AES-256-CTR encryption
noEncryptionInfo: Objects in this bucket will be stored unencrypted. You can enable encryption later if needed.
accessControlInfo: It is recommended to block all public access unless you specifically need to share data.
validationNameInvalid: Invalid bucket name. Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, dots and hyphens
validationVersioningRequired: Object Lock requires versioning to be enabled
validationRetentionModeRequired: You must select a retention mode for Object Lock
validationRetentionPeriodRequired: You must specify at least days or years of retention
confirmObjectLockWarning: This bucket will be IMMUTABLE and cannot be deleted until retention expires
